title: Bug 114905: Default value lost in list box of report parameter after modification
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: Upon modifying the default value of a report parameter's list box, the system fails to retain the specified default value.
EB: The system should preserve the initially set default value in the list box of the report parameter, even after making modifications.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameters section.
2. Set a default value in the list box of any report parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Save the changes and close the report parameters.
5. Reopen the report parameters to observe that the initially set default value is no longer retained.
